item.title: Cardiovascular Optimization Episode 1: Lifestyle Foundations
item.description:
Discover how VO₂ max and heart rate variability (HRV) predict longevity better than traditional risk factors, and learn the foundational lifestyle framework to optimize both (full report: https://yudame.github.io/research/podcast/episodes/2025-11-21-cardiovascular-health-episode-1-lifestyle/report.md). This evidence-based deep dive reveals that each 1-MET improvement in VO₂ max reduces all-cause mortality by 11-17%, while optimal sleep (7-8 hours) and the Mediterranean diet create synergistic effects that can prevent over 80% of cardiovascular events. Episode 1 of a 4-part series establishing the foundations—subsequent episodes cover advanced training protocols, HRV-guided recovery, and evidence-based supplementation.
Key Sources: • AHA Physical Activity Guidelines: https://www.heart.org/en/healthy-living/fitness/fitness-basics/aha-recs-for-physical-activity-in-adults • PREDIMED Mediterranean Diet Trial: https://www.bmj.com/content/337/bmj.a1344 • DASH Diet Meta-Analysis: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC10551663/ • VO₂ Max and Mortality Meta-Analysis: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC11103301/ • Sleep Duration and Cardiovascular Health: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC6201443/
item.itunes:keywords: VO2 max, heart rate variability, HRV, cardiovascular health, sleep optimization, Mediterranean diet, DASH diet, exercise physiology, HIIT training, baroreflex, autonomic nervous system, longevity, mortality risk, stress management, smoking cessation

item.title: Maximizing VO₂ Max and Heart Health: An Evidence-Based Guide
item.description:
Exploring heart rate variability (HRV) as your body's master index of adaptability and resilience (full report: https://yudame.github.io/research/podcast/episodes/2025-11-19-cardiovascular-health-optimization/report.md). This deep dive synthesizes data from landmark studies including the Whitehall II cohort (showing 6-20 year biological age differences from simple lifestyle consistency), behavioral modification trials that doubled training effectiveness, and temperature-controlled sleep research revealing sex-specific optimization strategies for busy professionals.
Key Sources: • Whitehall II Study on Cardiac Vagal Modulation: https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/JAHA.119.012420 • PubMed - Whitehall II Lifestyle and HRV: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31547790/ • Temperature-Controlled Sleep Study: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC11048088/ • Sleep and Cardiovascular Recovery Research: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/38671774/
item.itunes:keywords: heart rate variability, HRV, vagal tone, RMSSD, Whitehall II study, behavioral modification, VO2 max, sleep optimization, HIIT training, temperature control, autonomic nervous system, parasympathetic activity, recovery protocols, circadian alignment

item.title: Stablecoin Market: Strategies and Pitfalls
item.description:
A comprehensive analysis of stablecoin evolution from 2017-2025 (full report: https://yudame.github.io/research/podcast/episodes/2025-11-19-stablecoin-history/report.md), covering major events like the Terra/UST collapse, the GENIUS Act, and strategic lessons for launching new stablecoins. Learn about the "Three Pillars of Trust" and why fully-backed models dominate the $280B market.
Key Sources: • US GENIUS Act: https://www.congress.gov/bill/119th-congress/senate-bill/1582 • EU MiCA Regulation: https://www.esma.europa.eu/esmas-activities/digital-finance-and-innovation/markets-crypto-assets-regulation-mica • FSB Stablecoin Recommendations: https://www.fsb.org/2023/07/high-level-recommendations-for-the-regulation-supervision-and-oversight-of-global-stablecoin-arrangements-final-report/ • Terra Collapse Analysis: https://www.richmondfed.org/publications/research/economic_brief/2022/eb_22-24
item.itunes:keywords: stablecoins, cryptocurrency, regulation, GENIUS Act, Terra UST, USDC, Tether, blockchain, DeFi, financial regulation
